attributes.action: stop British taxpayers' money being given in aid to countries who use the money to buy weapons or support their military objectives against their own people or the people of other countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a recent report, Angola spent as much money as it received in foreign aid on fighting its own civil war. British taxpayers' money was therefore used, amongst other things,  to kill innocent civilians in Angola.
